greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of f(x, x^11) in powers of x where f(, ) is Ramanujan's general theta function.
comment: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: a(n) is the characteristic function of A195818. a(n) = max( 0, -A010815(n + 1)).
Expansion of (f(x, x^2) - f(-x, -x^2)) / (2*x) in powers of x. - _Michael Somos_, Aug 28 2017
mathematica: a[ n_] := With[{m = Sqrt[24 n + 25]}, If[ n >= 0 && IntegerQ @ m, Boole[ Mod[m, 12] == 5 || Mod[m, 12] == 7], 0]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 28 2017 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ x^12] QPochhammer[ -x^1, x^12] QPochhammer[ -x^11, x^12], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 28 2017 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); n = 3*n + 3; if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( (eta(x^2 + A)^2 / eta(x + A) - eta(x^3 + A) - x * eta(x^18 + A)^2 / eta(x^9 + A)) / 2, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 28 2017 */
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 21 2012
